oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Municipal Auditorium construction site with a view of Capitol Park Inn, 1961 October 06
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Nashville Mayor Ben West with two unidentified men on the construction site of the Municipal Auditorium, October 6th, 1961. The Capitol Park Inn is seen to the right at the address 400 5th Avenue N at Charlotte Avenue, 3. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
Nashville Municipal Auditorium (Tenn.); Capitol Park Inn (Nashville, Tenn.)
